proposal1.heroHeadline: Lesia is losing 120 hours a year writing proposals manually. Here's how to reclaim them.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Your team spends hours crafting beautiful proposals for each client. Now, they can be ready in just 47 seconds with our AI system.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every moment spent on manual proposal creation is a costly loss that affects your bottom line.

problems.title: Time Sinks
problems.description: Lesia spends 10 hours weekly on proposals. That's 520 hours a year not spent on designing websites, logos, and graphics.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Manual entries can lead to mistakes. A single error in a proposal can cost a client worth $10,000 or more.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding in proposals can confuse clients, risking projects that could bring in $5,000 each.

problems.title: Client Delays
problems.description: Waiting days for a proposal can push clients to competitors. This could mean losing deals averaging $8,000.

problems.title: Lost Focus
problems.description: Every hour on proposals is an hour not enhancing user experiences. This diversion affects project quality and satisfaction.

problems.title: Resource Drain
problems.description: Proposal writing diverts your three-person team from core design tasks. This costs you productivity and potential growth.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system is the answer to reclaiming time and improving proposal efficiency.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system delivers client-ready proposals in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Error-Free Documents
solutions.description: Manual processes are prone to mistakes. The AI system ensures all proposals are accurate and consistent.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Proposals are often inconsistent in branding. Our system maintains uniform branding across all documents.

solutions.title: Faster Client Responses
solutions.description: Clients wait days for proposals. With our system, they receive them in under a minute, accelerating decision times.

solutions.title: Focus on Design
solutions.description: Manual writing diverts focus from design. Our system frees your team to concentrate on delivering stunning user experiences.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Lesia.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Digital Presence with User-Centric Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's enhance your online experience to convert more visitors into loyal customers. We'll focus on creating a seamless user journey.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is losing potential customers every day due to an outdated online presence.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: With a current bounce rate of 70%, Acme Corp is losing potential customers who might otherwise engage with your services.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: Only 2% of visitors are converting into leads. This means 98% of traffic is not being utilized effectively.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: With 60% of users accessing your site via mobile, a subpar mobile experience results in missed opportunities.

problems.title: Outdated Brand Image
problems.description: An outdated website can cause a 30% drop in perceived brand value, turning away potential clients.

problems.title: Slow Page Load
problems.description: Every second of delay in page load time can result in a 7% decrease in conversion. This is a major revenue loss.

problems.title: Inconsistent User Journey
problems.description: Inconsistencies in user experience across platforms result in confusion and a lack of trust, costing you repeat visitors.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address these critical losses.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your site to be more user-friendly and visually appealing. This will reduce bounce rates.

solutions.title: Mobile Optimization
solutions.description: Enhance your mobile site to ensure a seamless experience on all devices. Capture the mobile audience effectively.

solutions.title: Performance Enhancement
solutions.description: Speed up your website's loading time. This will improve user satisfaction and conversion rate.

solutions.title: Brand Refresh
solutions.description: Update your brand visuals to align with current trends. Strengthen market positioning and customer trust.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Here's why Lesia is the perfect partner for Acme Corp.

whyUsCards.title: Experienced Team
whyUsCards.description: Our team has years of experience in crafting digital experiences that convert.

whyUsCards.title: User-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize user experience above all to ensure your customers have the best interaction with your brand.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are backed by measurable results and satisfied clients.

whyUsCards.title: Passionate Designers
whyUsCards.description: We love what we do, and it shows in our work. Our passion drives us to exceed expectations.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to your success.

team.name: Lesia Payne
team.role: Company Owner And Lead Ux Designer
team.bio: Lesia leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring that every project aligns with client goals. Her experience in user experience design guarantees innovative solutions.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your business and target audience.

process.title: Strategy & Planning
process.description: Develop a comprehensive strategy to address your business challenges.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Craft a visually stunning and functional website.

process.title: Testing & Launch
process.description: Ensure everything works perfectly before going live.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment option that best suits your needs.

pricing.name: Basic Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses wanting an online refresh.

pricing.name: Growth Plan
pricing.description: Our recommended package for growing businesses.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Your Online Presence?
proposal2.ctaDescription: We're here to chat about your goals and how we can help you achieve them.
proposal2.footerSub: We make the web beautiful and accessible.

lead.company_description:
We partner for postive change. 

We work with partners whose mission we connect with‚Äîwho are working to make the world better. For the past decade, we have put our time and expertise as designers, developers and UX strategists towards improving our community and giving back wherever we can.

We don't just design websites. We create valuable tools and information that your customers, clients and staff can actually use.

Whether we are doing graphic design or web development, our focus is usability so anyone can find what they are looking for, fast. Putting users first helps them find your website and helps your business grow.

Services include:
Responsive website design
User Experience (UX) design
Wireframing
Art direction
Logo design
Print graphic design
Signage and display design
Business card design
Packaging design
Trade show booth and banner design
Custom web development 
Customized Squarespace Websites
Information Architecture
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
User-testing
Tree testing
QA testing
Website & usability audits
Web applications
Mobile web applications
